sentences.en: Buddhism had to adapt to the new world or perish.
sentences.cn: 佛教必须适应新时代，否则将会消亡。

sentences.en: Do not blacken your fame, and perish in dishonour!
sentences.cn: 不要玷污你的名声, 不光彩地毁掉自己!

sentences.en: He must make the proper use of his opportunities or he will infallibly perish.
sentences.cn: 他必须善加利用机会,否则他必定毁灭.

sentences.en: Hundreds perished when the ship went down.
I know how soon youth would fade and bloom perish.
sentences.cn: 我知道,青春很快就会逝去,鲜花很快就会凋谢.

sentences.en: If any oil gets on the car tyres, it will perish them.
sentences.cn: 汽车胎沾上油就会毁坏.

sentences.en: Me a policeman! Perish the thought!
sentences.cn: 我当警察！想都别想了，不可能！

sentences.en: Oil on your car tires will perish them.
sentences.cn: 车胎上的油会毁损车胎.

sentences.en: Oil on your car tyres will perish them.
sentences.cn: 在你车胎上的油将会使车胎损坏.

sentences.en: Shall not a few perish, that the mass of the people may be saved?
sentences.cn: 为了使广大人民得救, 难道不应该牺牲少数人 吗 ?

sentences.en: Steam will fill the atmosphere and all life will perish.
sentences.cn: 水蒸汽将充满大气层,所有的生命都将毁灭.

sentences.en: The neighbours'children want to learn to play the trumpet, perish the thought!
sentences.cn: 邻居的孩子想学吹小号, 但愿他们别学!

sentences.en: They would rather all perish in the common ruin than fail or falter in their duty.
sentences.cn: 他们宁愿同归于尽,也不畏缩或逃避自己的职责.

sentences.en: Those that live by patronage shall surely perish by patronage.
sentences.cn: 那些靠恩赐而生存的人,必然会由于接受恩赐而垮台.

sentences.en: Well , I suppose that we that live by the sword shall perish by the sword.
sentences.cn: 依我看, 操刀为生者必死在刀下.

words.tran_cn: 易腐坏的；易毁灭的；会枯萎的
讨厌的人；死亡的东西；做事卤莽的人

phrases.tran_cn: 表达一种甚至从未想过的愿望

trans.tran_en: to die, especially in a terrible or sudden way

trans.tran_cn: 死亡，丧生，毁灭，腐烂，枯萎，老化
